secondary_school.name: Liceo Linguistico Internazionale Gabriele d'Annunzio Pescara

higher_education.university: Superior School of Advanced Studies of Pisa

client_description.Summary Note:
The RM met Ginevra Erika Ferrari at a yacht party in Rome. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Ginevra Erika Ferrari is a 48 year old CEO from Italy. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description.Family Background: Ginevra Erika Ferrari and Fabbri tied the knot in 2003. They do not have any children.
client_description.Education Background:
In 1995, Ginevra finished her secondary school education at Liceo Linguistico Internazionale Gabriele d'Annunzio Pescara.
Ginevra pursued higher education at Superior School of Advanced Studies of Pisa, graduating in 2001.
She also pursued further higher education at Italian Institute of Industrial Automation (IAS), graduating in 2004.
client_description.Occupation History:
Ginevra Erika Ferrari is a 48 year old CEO from Italy.
Ginevra Erika Ferrari launched her career as a Research Scientist at Menarini Industrie Farmaceutiche Riunite S.r.l., where she gained valuable experience from 2000 to 2002.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Biotech Startup Founder at Pfizer Italia S.r.l. in 2002, further expanding her skill set.
Her tenure as a CEO at Menarini Industrie Farmaceutiche Riunite S.r.l. from 2005 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 410000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has condo located in Catania, worth 930000 EUR.


Following the passing of her father, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, she received an inheritance of 6690000 EUR in 2006, which she has used to secure her financial future.
client_description.Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting her in achieving her financial goals.
